mdRecord.dcterms:title: As when fair maids won brave hearts in the halls of old Mount Vernon
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Curved stereograph. Humorous photograph. Mounted on gray board. Publisher's imprint on the front of the cardboard mount reads: Underwood & Underwood, Publishers. New York. London. Toronto-Canada. Ottawa-Kansas. Works and Studios - Sun Sculpture trademark. Washington, D. C. Arlington, N. J. Littleton, N. H. Title - As when fair maids won brave hears in the halls of Mount Vernon. Copyright 1900 by Underwood & Underwood. Titles of the stereograph are printed in English, French, German, Spanish, Swedish and Russian on the reverse.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Dance
